snippet: The moment a political campaign is assigned a Secret Service detail -- for Mitt Romney, it was Thursday -- tends to be a turning point, with a political downside as well as an upside.
abstract: The moment a political campaign is assigned a Secret Service detail -- for Mitt Romney, it was Thursday -- tends to be a turning point, with a political downside as well as an upside.

headline.main: For Romney, the Perils of Protection
headline.print_headline: Campaign Memo: Secret Service Comes, Access Goes
